name: NICOTINAMIDE
cautions:
Cautions avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes (including nose and mouth); reduce frequency
of application if excessive dryness, irritation or peeling
side-effects:
Side-effects dryness of skin; also pruritus, erythema, burning
and irritation
doses:
inflammatory acne vulgaris, apply twice daily; reduce
to once daily or on alternate days if irritation occurs
